sentence.Network_en: The root system of the soybean consists of a taproot formed by the radicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 大豆的根系包括由胚根形成的主根.

sentence.Network_en: Coleorhiza ( pl . coleorhizae ) The protective sheath surrounding the radicle in grasses.

sentence.Network_en: Among cotyledon , petiole of cotyledon, hypocotyl, and radicle, hypocotyl has the most responsive explants to 2, 4 - D .
sentence.Network_cn: 在子叶 、 叶柄 、 胚轴以及胚根四者当中, 下胚轴对2, 4-D 的反应状况最好.
